flawed_nl_solution:
Emma’s sister is 7 + 9 = <<7+9=20>>20 years old.
In this many years, Emma’s sister will be 56 years old: 56 - 20 = <<56-20=36>>36 years.
When her sister is 56 years old, Emma will be 7 + 36 = <<7+36=43>>43 years.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 20. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
